name: Mikuratori
desc:
This card gains the appropriate effect, based on its location in the Main Monster Zone.
● Left-most: Gains 1000 ATK and DEF.
● Right-most: This card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase.
● Middle: Cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects.
● Other: Monsters in the same column as this card cannot activate their effects.
